TopicTitle: Losing parts during transferring to Duna?

Articles.Content: I using mechjeb, calculated proper launch phase but my service module fall into pieces, why?
It's a bug with the time warp, don't disengage directly from high warp levels but go via 5x first
or just use the arrows above the right alt key

It's a bug with the time warp, don't disengage directly from high warp levels but go via 5x first

Thanks, I wonder when the Squad will fix it
It's already been fixed for 0.17.1, along with a couple other things. Look at the 0.17.1 progress update in the blogs.
